en.faulty.provider.config.error.message: Cannot fetch provider configuration for API-M Alerts History widget.
en.tooltip.filter.timestamp: Filter by alert timestamp. Timestamp is provided in the format 'Year-Month-Date Time'. The month is in MLA style (ex: Jan,Feb,..Dec), date is in 2 digit format (ex: 02, 23) and time is in 12 hour format in 2 digits (ex: 03:52:49 PM). For example: 2018-Nov-05 03:52:49 PM.
en.tooltip.filter.type: Filter by alert type using either one of the following values; Abnormal Backend Time, Abnormal Request Count, Abnormal Resource Access Pattern, Abnormal Response Time, Health Availability, Tier Crossing or Unseen Source IP Address.
en.tooltip.filter.severity: Filter by alert severity using either one of the following values; Mild, Moderate or Severe.
en.tooltip.date.range.picker.low.granularit: See lower order time range options
en.tooltip.date.range.picker.high.granulari: See higher order time range options
en.date.range.picker.invalid.time.range: Invalid date range, Please select a valid date range.
